ygData.msgSnippet: Thought raced through Halucigens head.  The super computer that had molded itself in his mind calculating percentages and chances. On one hand there was a bot

Subject: Halucigen finally replies.

Priority: normal

Thought raced through Halucigens head.  The super computer that 
had molded itself in his mind calculating percentages and chances. 
 
On one hand there was a bot on the outside who sais he is a 
strong warrior and wants Halucigen, and one of his minions come 
to get him, on the other the strength of the alliance.

He looked at FZ, then walked towards him.  "Yes I will join you," he 
said reaching his hand out to shake.  Meanwhile his tail was slowly 
drifting beside him, inching closer and closer to FZ.
